name: NeuroPlatformer
description:
Hit "Run game" and wait for it to load - then kill as many red enemies as you can. Collect hearts to get healed. Try a few times for a better experience :)

Controls:

  • Arrows - movement
  • Space/arrow up - jump
  • A - aim up
  • Z - aim down
  • Ctrl/Left mouse - shoot

Note: if controls don't work, you need to focus the game by clicking it with mouse.
